original_text: Trouble is coming to you people who live in Zion and on Samaria's hill. You think that you are safe. You think that you are important people who live in the best nation on earth. Israelite people respect you as their leaders.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 시온에서 교만한 자와 사마리아 산에서 마음이 든든한 자 곧 백성들의 머리인 지도자들이여 이스라엘 집이 그들을 따르는도다

sentences.original_text: Trouble is coming to you people
who live in Zion and on Samaria's hill
You think that you are safe
You think that you are important people
who live in the best nation on earth
Israelite people respect you as their leaders
